metadata.name: Velaschina
metadata.description:
The first item of the LightLine - the Milan collection.
Velaschina is inspired by the famous building Torre Velasca in Milan, designed by BBPR studio in 1956.
With each token is included a 3D model of the lamp and animation that can be placed in all supported metaverse spaces. 
A physical version can be requested and will be given upon availability.
